mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, uch.charge, uch.created_at FROM user_cash_history_tb uch JOIN user_tb u ON uch.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} AND uch.charge IS NOT NULL ORDER BY uch.created_at DESC;

SELECT u.user_id, uch.exchange, uch.created_at FROM user_cash_history_tb uch JOIN user_tb u ON uch.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.user_id = #{userId} AND uch.exchange IS NOT NULL ORDER BY uch.created_at DESC;

SELECT s.id, c.title AS class_title, u.nickname AS teacher_nickname, c.price AS class_price, s.spend AS spend, s.created_at AS created_at FROM spend_tb s JOIN class_tb c ON s.class_id = c.id JOIN user_tb u ON c.author_id = u.user_id WHERE s.user_id = 6 ORDER BY s.created_at DESC;
